title: Is dFuture based?
body:
Intro
Dfuture is a decentralized derivatives exchange. We are launching our public test. Mainnet and yield farming launch soon. Contracts will be made opensource once mainnet launches.

The innovative QCAMM (Quoted Price and Constant Sum Based Automated Market Maker) model allows a trading depth far beyond the centralized exchanges. Traders can use up to 30 times leverage to complete long / short trading at the desired price without slippage. LP only needs to stake a single settlement currency (currently USDT), which can obtain APY of more than 80% without risk of impermanent loss.

We are extremely inspired by $BASED A E S T H E T I C, help us get more B A S E D

Medium: [https://dfuture-finance.medium.com/dfuture-v1-beta-version-is-officially-launched-dc975b943960](https://dfuture-finance.medium.com/dfuture-v1-beta-version-is-officially-launched-dc975b943960)

Website: [http://www.dfuture.com/spread](http://www.dfuture.com/spread)

Referral Link: TBD when mainnet launches

Rover Plan:

We've studied past rovers closely and want to move our rover strategy up a notch. The plan is to launch dFuture rovers in trenches, and hopefully eternally, helping both dFuture and Based to get the fabled "eternal yield"(TM)

The based plan:

1. Direct Deposit into the Rover: $5k USD ETH or sUSD (depending on which one is more appropriate) distributed to the rover as a token of good will and sacrifice to the many based gods.
2. Referral Rewards for the Rover: A custom referral url for the based community to share. All referral fees would be distributed as our platform's native token DFT. As these DFT rewards stream in, we will continuously convert the DFT and make deposits into the rover, for the rovers to harvest the gains into $BASED.
3. Direct Rewards for based artists: We really liked how amplice/C C/TacoMoon/Mr.Bones and other artists worked with Rovers to help with their meme efforts. So we have thought about a special fund for the meme and art makers, based on meme quality and metrics such as retweets/engagement, we will market buy $BASED and payout to the coolest meme makers directly in $BASED tokens. If you are a meme maker and have commission slots available, please contact us as well.

If the Based community have any other ideas, please do discuss with us on telegram. Thank you!

Find us：
Website：http://www.dfuture.com
Telegram Group：https://t.me/dfutureglobal
Twitter：@dFuture_finance
Discord：https://discord.com/invite/q4ZGhHP
